product_name: The North Face GTD Capri Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Hit the trails in The North Face GTD Capri Tights for women. Their streamlined style means you can wear them alone or pair them as a sleek base layer for versatility when you need it. Supportive construction hugs the body and prevents chafing. Body-mapped ventilation features breathable mesh panels below the rear waistband and behind the knee to help keep you cool as you work up a sweat. Stash energy gels or car keys in the rear zip pocket. The North Face GTD Capri Tights have reflective logos. Closeout.
short_description: Hit the trails in The North Face GTD Capri Tights for women. Their streamlined style means you can wear them alone or pair them as a sleek base layer for versatility when you need it.
